title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, June 11, 2012 - CB Foods, Inc., an El Monte, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 55,757 pounds of pork dumpling products because it contains monosodium glutamate (MSG), which is not declared on the label, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service...

establishment.name: CB Foods Inc.
establishment.address:
566 Monterey Pass Road 
  Monterey Park, CA 91754

impacted_products: 12.5-lb cases or trays of "Pork Shaomai Dumpling" with a case code of 002
